Description: Blue glazed composition amuletic figure of Pataikos with a black scarab on the head, two snakes protruding from the corners of the mouth, a knife in each hand and a black crocodile beneath each foot; suspension ring at the back of the neck; the underside of the base is inscribed with protective symbols.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.39
